channel.title: Compiler problems
channel.description:
I just recently downloaded the foxscape source and im having trouble with the compiler it keep saying "Javac is not recognized as an internal or external command,operable program or batch file." I have verified that i have the most recent java download btw if this helps this is what the compiler says when u edit it.
@echo off color 09 title Foxscape Compiler javac *.java pause

item.title: Compiler problems
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

Control Panel > System > Advanced > Environmental Variables:

New > CLASSPATH > CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.
New > PATH > C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin

Should work with that compiler.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler problems

item.description:
@urba1lzrmine wrote:

I just recently downloaded the foxscape source and im having trouble with the compiler it keep saying “Javac is not recognized as an internal or external command,operable program or batch file.” I have verified that i have the most recent java download btw if this helps this is what the compiler says when u edit it.

@echo off
color 09
title Foxscape Compiler
javac *.java
pause
